definition: having the deep slightly brownish color of gold, a deep yellow color
details:
adjective
- having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
= example: having the deep slightly brownish color of gold
= synonyms: gilded
- made from or covered with gold
= example: made from or covered with gold
= synonyms: golden
noun
- a deep yellow color
= synonyms: amber
- something likened to the metal in brightness or preciousness or superiority etc.
= example: something likened to the metal in brightness or preciousness or superiority etc.
- great wealth
= example: great wealth
- coins made of gold
- a soft yellow malleable ductile (trivalent and univalent) metallic element
